ranked_issues.context: This is the #1 most common medical billing error, affecting millions of patients annually.
The #2 most frequent billing dispute, especially for emergency services and surprise out-of-network care.
The #3 most common issue, where providers bill for more expensive services than actually provided.
The #4 most frequent billing error, billing separately for services that should be bundled together.
The #5 most disputed charge, with facility fees often being unexpectedly high for outpatient services.
The #6 most common complaint, as many providers bill before insurance processes the claim.
The #7 issue, though less frequent, this can indicate clerical errors or potential fraud.
The #8 most disputed charge, particularly controversial due to high fees for services not always needed.
The #9 issue, increasingly common as private ambulance companies balance bill for emergency transport.
The #10 issue, but serious as it involves disputed or incorrect charges sent to collections.
